(product code={productCode} root={rootID}) That name or id and/or password is not correct. Please try again. (option {loginOption}) Your user account expired on {expiryDate}. Please contact your administrator. More than one user matches these details. Please contact your administrator. (login option {loginOption}) No anonymous user registered. No such group exists. Please contact your administrator. Can't set the instance ID for user {userID}. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. Can't get the instance ID for user {userID}. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. Someone else has logged in with your details. Please try again. ({instanceID}) This account has not set the login options. ({loginOption}) Please type in your login details. ({loginOption}) Your group has been blocked from using this program. Please contact your teacher or administrator for help. Sorry, these details have already been used. Please try again. (login option {loginOption}) Sorry, you don't have permission to run this program. (type is {userType}) Your account hasn't started yet. Please contact your administrator. Your account expired on {expiryDate}. Please contact your administrator. Unable to clear old licences. This licence is full, please contact your administrator. This licence is full, please try again later. Error reading licence control table. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. The licence type {licenceType} is not recognised. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. Error, can't find this licence {licenceID}. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. Error, can't update this licence {licenceID}. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. Error, can't delete this licence {licenceID}. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. Error, can't allocate a licence number. This licence can only run from certain computers. Your IP is {ip}. This licence can only run from certain websites. You came from {referrer}. This licence can only run from certain computers or websites. You came from {referrer} with {ip}. Sorry, there is a problem: The menu xml has more than one exercise node with ID={exerciseID}. Database can't find auto-increment session ID. Unable to read exercise {filename} ({message}). Please contact support@clarityenglish.com with the file name. Error parsing exercise detection {filename} ({message1} {message2})}. Found multiple Exercise nodes in the menu xml matching {href}. Unable to find any Exercise nodes in the menu xml matching {href}. The menu xml has no exercise node with ID={exerciseID}. Error reading from the database. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. Error writing to the database. Please contact support@clarityenglish.com. This program is not running in a recognised SCORM LMS. You wanted to open specific content, but the {idType} ID={id} was wrong. You have logged in anonymously, so your progress will not be saved after you close the program. Clarity would like to thank the following people for giving their voices to Tense Buster: Simon Broad,
Jessica Caplan, Sally Nichols, Ben Pelletier, Kath Ryan, Scott Sauer, Michelle Tam, Sarah Toogood.

Photos were taken from Shutterstock with permission.

Every effort has been made to trace owners of copyright, but if any omissions can be rectified,
we will be pleased to make the necessary arrangements.
